duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide subject matter expertise in regional strategy and policy recommendations related to energy market activities including the real-time energy and day-ahead market operations.
Plan, manage, and lead projects and initiatives related to real-time energy and day-ahead markets.
Oversee and manage all market tools, procedures, and event cutover processes for real-time operations.
Collaborate with internal business units to ensure coordination in market-related stakeholder activities.
Identify, analyze, and resolve real-time issues and projects related to the energy market.
Participate on various advisory committees and task forces on behalf of the organization's interests.
Provide input into team employee performance reviews and flag performance and personnel issues for resolution.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Business, Economics, or a related field (Master's preferred)
